snippet: TRIPLES HALL.--Third Concert by Catharine Hayes, Doors open at 7. BROADWAY.--Gladiater' and 'My Yound Wife and My Old Umbrella.' Doors open 7. NIBLO'S--'Knights of Area' and 'His Last Lags.' Doors open at 7. BURTON'S.--'School for Scandal' and 'Th...
lead_paragraph: TRIPLES HALL.--Third Concert by Catharine Hayes, Doors open at 7. BROADWAY.--Gladiater' and 'My Yound Wife and My Old Umbrella.' Doors open 7. NIBLO'S--'Knights of Area' and 'His Last Lags.' Doors open at 7. BURTON'S.--'School for Scandal' and 'That Rascal Jack.' Doors open at 7. BROUGHAM'S,--'Guy Mannering' and 'The Yachi Rack.' Doors open at 7.
